PresentationColumn.name: 12 month COG ROI %
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the ROI of a campaign based on an estimated 12 month COG value (100* 12 month COG value / Marketing Costs)

PresentationColumn.name: 5 Year COG Cost Ratio
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the 5 Year COG income vs the amount spent aquiring the income. (marketing cost / Donation.5 Year COG income)

PresentationColumn.name: 5 Year COG ROI %
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the ROI of a campaign based on an estimated 5 year COG value (100* 5 Year COG value / Marketing Costs)

PresentationColumn.name: 5 Year Cost Ratio (No Gift Aid)
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the cost ratio of COG campaigns based on a modelled 5 year future value. This metric is used to more accuraretly predict the inital cost ratio of a COG campaign rather than using individual donations. ( Marketing Costs / 5 Year COG value )

PresentationColumn.name: COG Cost Ratio
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the 12month COG income vs the amount spent aquiring the income. (marketing cost / Donation.12 month COG income)

PresentationColumn.name: Cost Ratio
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the income vs the amount spent aquiring the income. (marketing cost / Donation.amount)

PresentationColumn.name: # Cancelled COGS
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric counts the number of COGs with a status of cancelled (COG order is not lapsed and has a cancelled flag)

PresentationColumn.name: # Never Paid
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric is calcules the number of COG orders that have been recoreded as neverpaid. This is calculated in the ETL and is flagged on the order (Orders.Never paid Flag = Y)

PresentationColumn.name: # of Active COG Orders
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the number of COGs that are not cancelled and not lapsed or never paid.

PresentationColumn.name: # of Active Direct Debits
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the number of direct debits that are not cancelled or lapsed or never paid.

PresentationColumn.name: # of Active Standing Orders
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the number of standing orders that are not cancelled or lapsed or never paid.

PresentationColumn.name: # of COG Orders
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric counts the # of COG Orders (count orders.type = 'Any Covenanted Payment', 'Direct Debit', 'Standing Order')

PresentationColumn.name: # of Donation Headers
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the # of Orders (Order_wid)

PresentationColumn.name: # of Donations
PresentationColumn.Description: Number of Donations

PresentationColumn.name: # of Lapsed
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric is calcules the number of COG orders that have lapsed. This is calculated in the ETL and is flagged on the order (Orders.Lapse Flag = Y)

PresentationColumn.name: # of Products with Donations
PresentationColumn.Description: Total # of Products with at least one order (donations.product_wid)

PresentationColumn.name: # Upgraded by Call (Historical)
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the number of people that have been upgraded by call based on source codes

PresentationColumn.name: # Upgraded by Email (Historical)
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the number of people that have been upgraded by email based on source codes

PresentationColumn.name: # Upgraded by Mail (Historical)
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the number of people that have been upgraded by mail based on source codes

PresentationColumn.name: 12 Month Average COG Gift
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the average of the estimated 12 month COG values

PresentationColumn.name: 12 Month COG Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates and sums estimated COG income for the next 12 months based on the frequency and frequency amount. (IF order.type = 'Any Covenanted Payment', 'Direct Debit', 'Standing Order' then 12 month value)

PresentationColumn.name: 5 Year Cog Income(Old)
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric estimates the 5 year value of a COG based on a lapse rate of 30% (12 month COG value * 5 * 0.7)

PresentationColumn.name: 5 Year Net COG Income
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric is an estimate of the 5 year value of COG orders less the marketing cost of the campaign. This metric should only be used with a campaign.

PresentationColumn.name: AVG Monthly COG Amount
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the average of the estimated monthly equivalant COG values

PresentationColumn.name: Frequency Amount
PresentationColumn.Description: This attribute is the donation amount regularly given as part of a COG order.

PresentationColumn.name: Max 12 Month COG Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates and sums estimated COG income for the next 12 months based on the frequency and frequency amount. (IF order.type = 'Any Covenanted Payment', 'Direct Debit', 'Standing Order' then 12 month value)

PresentationColumn.name: Order Total Amount
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the total order value based on information from Care Contacts (Order number of payments * Frequency value)

PresentationColumn.name: 12 Month Upgraded Original Order Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: This is the 12 Month COG Revenue from which the Order has been updated from.The Upgrade campaigns contains any of MUP, MOU. MTU, MHM, MHT.
